title: First, use the change-of-base formula and choose $$k=5$$.
You should have $$\frac{\operatorname{log_5}\left(55\right)}{\operatorname{log_5}\left(6\right)}$$. Notice, $$\operatorname{log_5}\left(6\right)$$ is our given a.
Factor $$55$$ into $$5\times11$$ and apply the product rule. You should have $$\operatorname{log_5}\left(5\right)+\operatorname{log_5}\left(11\right)$$ which equals $$1+b$$.
